import axios from"axios";import{AdminActionType}from"./types-interfaces";import Swal from"sweetalert2";axios.defaults.headers.common["x-access-token"]="eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpZCI6MSwiaWF0IjoxNjc2MDI4NDI5LCJleHAiOjE2NzYxMTQ4Mjl9.92JhKvWFk6gi0M41zsyxGkxpuHs_xicYpHKvXEbRraM";//Product actions
export var ADMfetch_products=function ADMfetch_products(){return function(dispatch){axios.get("/products/").then(function(res){var payload=res.data;dispatch({type:AdminActionType.GET_ALL_PRODUCTS,payload:payload});});};};export var ADMfetch_products_name=function ADMfetch_products_name(name){return function(dispatch){axios.get("/products/search/".concat(name)).then(function(res){var payload=res.data;dispatch({type:AdminActionType.GET_PRODUCT_BY_NAME,payload:payload});});};};export var ADMfetch_products_id=function ADMfetch_products_id(id){return function(dispatch){axios.get("/products/".concat(id)).then(function(res){var payload=res.data;dispatch({type:AdminActionType.GET_PRODUCT_BY_ID,payload:payload});});};};export var ADMcreate_product=function ADMcreate_product(payload){axios.post("/products/",payload).then(function(res){Swal.fire({title:"Se creo el producto con exito",confirmButtonText:"OK"});}).catch(function(err){Swal.fire({title:err.response.data.message,cancelButtonText:"OK"});});};export var ADMupdate_product=function ADMupdate_product(payload){axios.put("/products",payload).then(function(){return Swal.fire({title:"Se edito el producto con exito",confirmButtonText:"OK"});}).catch(function(err){return Swal.fire({title:err.response.data.message,cancelButtonText:"OK"});});};export var ADMdelete_product=function ADMdelete_product(payload){axios.delete("/products/".concat(payload)).then(function(){return Swal.fire({title:"Se elimino el producto con exito",confirmButtonText:"OK"});}).catch(function(err){return Swal.fire({title:err.response.data.message,cancelButtonText:"OK"});});};//Orders Actions
export var ADMfetch_orders=function ADMfetch_orders(){return function(dispatch){axios.get("/orders").then(function(res){var payload=res.data;dispatch({type:AdminActionType.GET_ALL_ORDERS,payload:payload});}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error);});};};export var ADMfetch_order_id=function ADMfetch_order_id(id){return function(dispatch){axios.get("/orders/".concat(id)).then(function(res){var payload=res.data;dispatch({type:AdminActionType.GET_ORDER_BY_ID,payload:payload});}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error);});};};export var ADMupdate_order=function ADMupdate_order(id,status){axios.put("/orders/?id=".concat(id,"&status=").concat(status)).then(function(){return alert("OK");});};//Users Actions
export var ADMfetch_users=function ADMfetch_users(){return function(dispatch){axios.get("/users").then(function(res){var payload=res.data;dispatch({type:AdminActionType.GET_ALL_USERS,payload:payload});}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error);});};};export var ADMfetch_users_id=function ADMfetch_users_id(id){return function(dispatch){axios.get("/users/".concat(id)).then(function(res){var payload=res.data;dispatch({type:AdminActionType.GET_USER_BY_ID,payload:payload});}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error);});};};
